### Models

#### Basic structural model
```{r}
s<-rjd3toolkit::ABS$X0.2.20.10.M
model<-rjd3sts::model()
llt<-locallineartrend("llt")
seas<-seasonal("seas", period=frequency(s), type="HarrisonStevens")
noise<-noise("n", fixed = TRUE)
add(model, llt)
add(model, seas)
add(model, noise)
rslt<-estimate(model, log(s))
  
```
